instance_template: component("cpu", "FalconX", 600, 125). component("cpu", "CoreZen", 500, 115). component("cpu", "EcoMini", 300, 90). component("gpu", "TitanZ", 700, 135). component("gpu", "MidlineGT", 500, 100). component("gpu", "Pixie", 400, 95). component("drive", "FlashNova", 250, 110). component("drive", "Terabox", 300, 100). component("drive", "BudgetDisk", 150, 60).
generator: 1 { selected(Type, Name) : component(Type, Name, Cost, Perf) } 1 :- Type = ("cpu"; "gpu"; "drive").

hard_constraints.description: The performance score of the selected GPU must be strictly greater than the minimum performance score among all selected components.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- selected("gpu", G), component("gpu", G, _, PG), P_min = #min { P : selected(T, N), component(T, N, _, P) }, PG <= P_min.

hard_constraints.description: The performance score of the selected GPU must be strictly less than the maximum performance score among all selected components.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- selected("gpu", G), component("gpu", G, _, PG), P_max = #max { P : selected(T, N), component(T, N, _, P) }, PG >= P_max.

hard_constraints.description: The component characterized by a performance score strictly between the minimum and maximum performance scores must be assigned the minimum cost among the selected set.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- selected(T1, N1), component(T1, N1, C1, P1), P_max = #max { P : selected(T, N), component(T, N, _, P) }, P_min = #min { P : selected(T, N), component(T, N, _, P) }, C_min = #min { C : selected(T, N), component(T, N, C, _) }, P1 > P_min, P1 < P_max, C1 != C_min.

hard_constraints.description: If a CPU with a unit cost exceeding 500 USD is selected, the GPU designated as 'Pixie' is prohibited.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- selected("cpu", N), component("cpu", N, C, _), C > 500, selected("gpu", "Pixie").

hard_constraints.description: The absolute difference between the maximum and minimum performance scores within the selected configuration must not exceed 50 points.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- P_max = #max { P : selected(T, N), component(T, N, _, P) }, P_min = #min { P : selected(T, N), component(T, N, _, P) }, P_max - P_min > 50.

hard_constraints.description: If the FlashNova drive is selected, the GPU performance score must be greater than or equal to 100.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- selected("drive", "FlashNova"), selected("gpu", G), component("gpu", G, _, PG), PG < 100.

hard_constraints.description: The configuration must contain exactly two components whose individual costs are strictly greater than 300 USD.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- N = #count { T, Name : selected(T, Name), component(T, Name, C, _), C > 300 }, N != 2.
